description.value: The Broadside Hardpoint is a modification to two Fixed Hardpoints that grants an additional limited firing arc to each hardpoint, as described in chapter 9. The hardpoints must share at least 1 limited firing arc, and the two firing arcs of a hardpoint need not be adjacent. This modification installs a dedicated gunner station for each hardpoint. Attacks made utilizing the additional limited firing arc can only be made by a crew member deployed at the dedicated gunner station of the weapon.
